Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • Settings
  • public class Settings
extends Object
    Class that holds the game's data about settings. It is created using the Singleton Pattern.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dimitrios Zisis

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Map<String,​Boolean> getCarAvailability()
      Returns a Map containing all the available cars.
      int getCumulativeMapsCount()
      Returns the integer representation of the number of cumulative maps available.
      static Settings getInstance()
      Returns the (only) instance of class Settings.
      int getSecondsPerLevel()
      Returns the integer representation of the number of seconds the user has to complete a level.
      String getSelectedCar()
      Returns a String with the selected car.
      void setSelectedCar​(String sc)
      Sets the selected car.
      void updateCarAvailability()
      Updates car availability according to the scores.
